statements: REVOKE SELECT, INSERT ON sensors TO employee1
REVOKE UPDATE, DELETE ON readings TO employee2
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON sensors, readings TO employee3
REVOKE SELECT ON smart_streetlights FROM user1
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON traffic_cameras FROM user2
REVOKE DELETE ON weather_sensors FROM user3
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON city FROM user1;
REVOKE INSERT, UPDATE ON sensors FROM user2;
REVOKE SELECT ON events FROM user3;
REVOKE SELECT ON users FROM public
REVOKE UPDATE(name, age) ON users FROM public
REVOKE SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON events FROM public
